page.title: 04CLUBS
page.content: Callander's population, young and old, has the opportunity to join many different clubs and societies. Toddler and play groups cater for { {children under 5.School children}can attend Girl Guides, Boy Scouts and Boy's Brigade organisations, youth clubs,Red Cross,Junior R.S.S.P.C.C. and{football.Church groups} are Sunday School, Bible Class. Youth Fellowship, Young Women's Guild. Linked with the {schools }are the P.T.A.and former pupils clubs.{Sports} minded people may join tennis, badminton, squash, football, golf, bowling, snooker,fishing, rifle shooting.There is a Young Farmers club which caters for the farming community.S.W.R.I.,R.S.S.P.C.C.,Ladies Circle,Dancefit,Yoga cater for ladies only,while 7.45club,Round Table,Rotary are for men.A Bridge Club exists .
